    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public static void shoot(Board x,
         Ship[] shipArray)
        Asks the player a place to shoot on the playing field.

        Asks the player for a letter and a number to know which spot on the playing field will be shot.

        Parameters:
        x - the board to be shot.
        shipArray - and array of Ships located on the board.

      • letterToNumber

        public static int letterToNumber(java.lang.String x)
        Changes a letter to a number.

        Takes a valid input of a letter from A to J and changes it to a number representing it on the playing field array.

        Parameters:
        x - the letter to be changed.
        Returns:
        an integer from 0 to 9.

      • chooseShips

        public static void chooseShips(Board x,
               Ship[] shipArray)
        Asks the player for a spot to place a ship.

        Asks for a letter and a number representing the spot on the playing field from where the ship will be started from and follows up with a question for the direction to which the ship will be built.

        Parameters:
        x - the board to which the ship will be placed.
        shipArray - the array of Ship objects to be placed.
